00015 #ifndef __MEZZO_EXCEPTIONS__
00016 #define __MEZZO_EXCEPTIONS__
00017 
00018 #include <string>
00019 #include <exception>
00020 
00021 namespace Mezzo {
00022 
00023 class Exception : public std::exception {
00024  public:
00025    Exception(std::string _description, std::string _location):
00026       description(_description),
00027       location(_location)
00028    {
00029    }
00030 
00031    ~Exception() throw() { }
00032 
00033    std::string description;
00034    std::string location;
00035 };
00036 
00037 /// An error within the library that is no fault of the client.
00038 /// It is unlikely that the client can recover in any useful way.
00039 class InternalException : public Exception
00040 {
00041  public:
00042    InternalException(std::string _description, std::string _location):
00043       Exception(_description, _location)
00044    {
00045    }
00046 };
00047 
00048 /// An error that indicates a bug in the client program.  This probably
00049 /// means the client passed invalid parameters to a library method.
00050 class ClientException : public Exception
00051 {
00052  public:
00053    ClientException(std::string _description, std::string _location):
00054       Exception(_description, _location)
00055    {
00056    }
00057 };
00058 
00059 /// An error that is beyond either the library or the client's control.
00060 /// Perhaps the disk is full or a file that the library wrote disappeared.
00061 class UserException : public Exception
00062 {
00063  public:
00064    UserException(std::string _description, std::string _location):
00065       Exception(_description, _location)
00066    {
00067    }
00068 };
00069 
00070 #define UserAssert(cond, msg) do {if(!(cond)) UserAssertFailure(#cond, msg, __FILE__, __LINE__);} while (0)
00071 #define ClientAssert(cond, msg) do {if(!(cond)) ClientAssertFailure(#cond, msg, __FILE__, __LINE__);} while (0)
00072 #define InternalAssert(cond, msg) do {if(!(cond)) InternalAssertFailure(#cond, msg, __FILE__, __LINE__);} while(0)
00073 
00074 void UserAssertFailure    (std::string expr, std::string msg, std::string file, int line);
00075 void ClientAssertFailure  (std::string expr, std::string msg, std::string file, int line);
00076 void InternalAssertFailure(std::string expr, std::string msg, std::string file, int line);
00077 
00078 
00079 } // namespace
00080 
00081 #endif
